name: Cosmonet: Space Adventure
description:
Cosmonet: Space Adventure - a mixture of dynamic adventure and clicker. In the game you will be part of the crew of a spacecraft, sent into the depths of a huge meteorite in search of intelligent life.
You need to stock up on courage and dexterity, so as not to please at full speed in alien ships or the surface of a meteorite.
You can not only prove yourself by flying to the very center, but also pump your dexterity, and demonstrate to everyone what you are capable of!

Features:

- Beautiful graphics
- Dynamic music
- Easy to learn management
- The atmosphere of far space
